full_summary:
**Purchase of a Microscope**
=====================================

**Reference Number:** cb-807-39808045
**Amendment Number:** 7
**Solicitation Number:** 2024-00070

**Announcement Published:**
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase of a microscope tailored to meet the specific needs of the Animal Health Microbiology Laboratory.

**Key Requirements:**

* The microscope must be capable of performing wet mounts at 100x magnification
* Quality control for the Laboratory must also be ensured

**Contract Terms:**

* The expected start date for the contract is November 27, 2023
* The expected end date for the contract is March 31, 2024
* The contract will be evaluated on a competitive basis, with the lowest-priced proposal receiving first consideration

**Procurement Details:**

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:**

* The CFIA is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Geographic Scope:**

* The contract will be delivered in Canada, with the National Capital Region (NCR) being a key area of operation

**Contracting Entity:**

* The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
* Address: 59 Camelot Drive, Floor 1 W, Ottawa, ON K1A 0Y9, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Alda Garcia
* Email: alda.garcia@inspection.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 296-7367

**Attachments:**

* Tender notice and RFP documents are available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

**Tender Closing Date:** November 13, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST

Note: Please ensure that you have met the specified deadline for submitting your proposal. No late submissions will be accepted. [1](#fn1)

[1]. Tender closing date specified in the RFP document. Please refer to the attached document for further details.
